ECSchema.description: Schema modeling the spatial breakdown of concepts common across Civil domains such as Road, Rail or Site.

ECEntityClass.description: The spatial location of a geographic site on which Facilities are situated. Its geometry is typically provided as a 2D/Plan-projected boundary.
Further specializes a particular subclass of a Site by associating a custom Type that can be defined by users.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific cvsp:Site is an instance of the defined cvsp:SiteType.

ECEntityClass.description: A spcomp:Space modeling an Area bounded either physically or virtually that provides for some function within a Site, Road or Rail.
A cvsp:Space whose are is dedicated for use as a parking spot for vehicles, including access, such as a parking aisle.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of cvsp:ParkingArea rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific cvsp:ParkingArea is an instance of the defined cvsp:ParkingAreaType.

ECEntityClass.description: A cvsp:Space modeling an area with clear boundaries that can be legally bought, sold or owned, and therefore is a fundamental unit in property ownership and transactions.
A cvsp:Space modeling a subsidiary area raised or marked on a cvsp:ParkingArea, shaped and placed so as to direct traffic movement and/or provide refuge for pedestrians.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of cvsp:ParkingIsland rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific cvsp:ParkingIsland is an instance of the defined cvsp:ParkingIslandType.

ECEntityClass.description: A cvsp:Space modeling a location that is designated for parking of one or more vehicles.

ECProperty.description: Number of parking-spaces in this Parking-Row

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of cvsp:ParkingRow rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific cvsp:ParkingRow is an instance of the defined cvsp:ParkingRowType.

ECEntityClass.description: A cvsp:Space modeling a footpath for pedestrians.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of cvsp:Sidewalk rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific cvsp:Sidewalk is an instance of the defined cvsp:SidewalkType.

ECEntityClass.description: A cvsp:Space modeling the Area of land reserved for the storage of water temporarily after a storm, or permanently for different purposes.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of cvsp:PondArea rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific cvsp:PondArea is an instance of the defined cvsp:PondAreaType.

ECEntityClass.description: A cvsp:Space modeling Site-Areas which cannot be further classified. More-specific cvsp:Space subclasses should be used wherever possible.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of cvsp:GenericArea rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific cvsp:GenericArea is an instance of the defined cvsp:GenericAreaType.
